atk-abh02a3:2: 189. Idāni tadanantare saccavibhaṅge cattārīti gaṇanaparicchedo. Ariyasaccānīti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṁ. Dukkhaṁ ariyasaccantiādimhi pana uddesavāre –
atk-abh02a3:5: Kamato ariyasaccesu, yaṁ ñāṇaṁ tassa kiccato;
atk-abh02a3:9_0: Tattha ‘vibhāgato’ti dukkhādīnañhi cattāro cattāro atthā vibhattā tathā avitathā
atk-abh02a3:9_1: anaññathā, ye dukkhādīni abhisamentehi abhisametabbā. Yathāha, “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho,
atk-abh02a3:9_2: saṅkhataṭṭho, santāpaṭṭho, vipariṇāmaṭṭho – ime cattāro dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhā tathā
atk-abh02a3:9_3: avitathā anaññathā. Samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho, nidānaṭṭho, saṁyogaṭṭho, palibodhaṭṭho…pe…
atk-abh02a3:9_4: nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho, vivekaṭṭho, asaṅkhataṭṭho, amataṭṭho…pe… maggassa niyyānaṭṭho,
atk-abh02a3:9_5: hetvaṭṭho, dassanaṭṭho, ādhipateyyaṭṭho – ime cattāro maggassa maggaṭṭhā tathā avitathā
atk-abh02a3:9_6: anaññathā”ti. Tathā “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho, saṅkhataṭṭho, santāpaṭṭho, viparināmaṭṭho,
atk-abh02a3:9_7: abhisamayaṭṭho”ti evamādi. Iti evaṁ vibhattānaṁ catunnaṁ catunnaṁ atthānaṁ vasena
atk-abh02a3:9_8: dukkhādīni veditabbānīti. Ayaṁ tāvettha vibhāgato vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a3:10_1: saddo kucchite dissati; kucchitañhi puttaṁ duputtoti vadanti. ‘Khaṁ’saddo pana tucche;
atk-abh02a3:10_2: tucchañhi ākāsaṁ khanti vuccati. Idañca paṭhamasaccaṁ kucchitaṁ anekaupaddavādhiṭṭhānato,
atk-abh02a3:10_4: ca dukkhanti vuccati. ‘Saṁ’iti ca ayaṁ saddo “samāgamo sameta”ntiādīsu saṁyogaṁ dīpeti;
atk-abh02a3:10_5: ‘u’iti ayaṁ saddo “uppannaṁ udita”ntiādīsu uppattiṁ. ‘Aya’saddo pana kāraṇaṁ dīpeti.
atk-abh02a3:10_6: Idañcāpi dutiyasaccaṁ avasesapaccayasamāyoge sati dukkhassuppattikāraṇaṁ. Iti dukkhassa
atk-abh02a3:11_0: Tatiyasaccaṁ pana yasmā ‘ni’saddo abhāvaṁ ‘rodha’saddo ca cārakaṁ dīpeti, tasmā abhāvo
atk-abh02a3:11_1: ettha saṁsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisuññattā, samadhigate vā tasmiṁ
atk-abh02a3:11_2: saṁsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa abhāvo hoti tappaṭipakkhattātipi dukkhanirodhanti
atk-abh02a3:11_3: vuccati, dukkhassa vā anuppādanirodhapaccayattā dukkhanirodhanti. Catutthasaccaṁ
atk-abh02a3:11_4: pana yasmā etaṁ dukkhanirodhaṁ gacchati ārammaṇavasena tadabhimukhībhūtattā, paṭipadā
atk-abh02a3:11_5: ca hoti dukkhanirodhappattiyā, tasmā dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti vuccati.
atk-abh02a3:12_0: Yasmā panetāni buddhādayo ariyā paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccanti. Yathāha
atk-abh02a3:12_1: – “catārimāni, bhikkhave, ariyasaccāni. Katamāni…pe… imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri
atk-abh02a3:12_2: ariyasaccāni. Ariyā imāni paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti. Apica
atk-abh02a3:12_3: ariyassa saccānītipi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha – “sadevake, bhikkhave, loke…pe… sadevamanussāya
atk-abh02a3:12_4: tathāgato ariyo, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti. Atha vā etesaṁ abhisambuddhattā
atk-abh02a3:12_5: ariyabhāvasiddhitopi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha – “imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ
atk-abh02a3:12_6: yathābhūtaṁ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho ‘ariyo’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-abh02a3:12_7: Apica kho pana ariyāni saccānītipi ariyasaccāni; ariyānīti tathāni avitathāni avisaṁvādakānīti
atk-abh02a3:12_8: attho. Yathāha – “imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri ariyasaccāni tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni,
atk-abh02a3:12_9: tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti. Evamettha nibbacanato vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a3:13_0: Kathaṁ ‘lakkhaṇādippabhedato’? Ettha hi bādhanalakkhaṇaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ, santāpanarasaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:14_0: ‘Atthatthuddhārato cevā’ti ettha pana atthato tāva ko saccaṭṭhoti ce? Yo paññācakkhunā
atk-abh02a3:14_1: upaparikkhamānānaṁ māyāva viparītako, marīcīva visaṁvādako, titthiyānaṁ attāva anupalabbhasabhāvo
atk-abh02a3:14_2: ca na hoti; atha kho bādhanapabhavasantiniyyānappakārena tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvena
atk-abh02a3:14_3: ariyañāṇassa gocaro hotiyeva; esa aggilakkhaṇaṁ viya, lokapakati viya ca tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo
atk-abh02a3:14_4: saccaṭṭhoti veditabbo. Yathāha – “idaṁ dukkhanti kho, bhikkhave, tathametaṁ avitathametaṁ
atk-abh02a3:15: Nābādhakaṁ yato dukkhaṁ, dukkhā aññaṁ na bādhakaṁ;
atk-abh02a3:17: Taṁ vinā nāññato dukkhaṁ, na hoti na ca taṁ tato;
atk-abh02a3:19: Nāññā nibbānato santi, santaṁ na ca na taṁ yato;
atk-abh02a3:21: Maggā aññaṁ na niyyānaṁ, aniyyāno na cāpi so;
atk-abh02a3:26_0: Kathaṁ ‘atthuddhārato’? Idhāyaṁ ‘sacca’saddo anekesu atthesu dissati, seyyathidaṁ
atk-abh02a3:26_1: – “saccaṁ bhaṇe, na kujjheyyā”tiādīsu vācāsacce. “Sacce ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā cā”tiādīsu
atk-abh02a3:26_2: viratisacce. “Kasmā nu saccāni vadanti nānā, pavādiyāse kusalāvadānā”tiādīsu diṭṭhisacce.
atk-abh02a3:26_3: “Ekañhi saccaṁ na dutiyamatthī”tiādīsu paramatthasacce nibbāne ceva magge ca. “Catunnaṁ
atk-abh02a3:26_4: ariyasaccānaṁ kati kusalā”tiādīsu ariyasacce. Svāyamidhāpi ariyasacce vattatīti evamettha
atk-abh02a3:27_0: ‘Anūnādhikato’ti kasmā pana cattāreva ariyasaccāni vuttāni, anūnāni anadhikānīti
atk-abh02a3:27_1: ce? Aññassāsambhavato, aññatarassa ca anapaneyyabhāvato; na hi etehi aññaṁ adhikaṁ
atk-abh02a3:27_2: vā etesaṁ vā ekampi apanetabbaṁ sambhoti. Yathāha – “idha, bhikkhave, āgaccheyya
atk-abh02a3:27_3: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ‘netaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ yaṁ samaṇena
atk-abh02a3:27_4: gotamena desitaṁ. Ahametaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā aññaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ
atk-abh02a3:27_5: paññapessāmī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”tiādi. Yathā cāha – “yo hi koci, bhikkhave,
atk-abh02a3:27_6: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṁ vadeyya ‘netaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ, yaṁ samaṇena
atk-abh02a3:27_7: gotamena desitaṁ. Ahametaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paccakkhāya aññaṁ dukkhaṁ
atk-abh02a3:27_8: paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paññapessāmī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”tiādi.
atk-abh02a3:28_0: Apica pavattimācikkhanto bhagavā sahetukaṁ ācikkhi, nivattiñca saupāyaṁ. Iti pavattinivattitadubhayahetūnaṁ
atk-abh02a3:28_1: etapparamato cattāreva vuttāni. Tathā pariññeyya pahātabba sacchikātabba bhāvetabbānaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:28_3: vasenāpi cattāreva vuttānīti. Evamettha ‘anūnādhikato’ vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a3:29_0: ‘Kamato’ti ayampi desanākkamova. Ettha ca oḷārikattā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā ca suviññeyyanti
atk-abh02a3:29_1: dukkhasaccaṁ paṭhamaṁ vuttaṁ, tasseva hetudassanatthaṁ tadanantaraṁ samudayasaccaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:29_2: hetunirodhā phalanirodhoti ñāpanatthaṁ tato nirodhasaccaṁ, tadadhigamupāyadassanatthaṁ
atk-abh02a3:29_3: ante maggasaccaṁ. Bhavasukhassādagadhitānaṁ vā sattānaṁ saṁvegajananatthaṁ paṭhamaṁ
atk-abh02a3:29_4: dukkhamāha. Taṁ neva akataṁ āgacchati, na issaranimmānādito hoti, ito pana hotīti
atk-abh02a3:29_5: ñāpanatthaṁ tadanantaraṁ samudayaṁ. Tato sahetukena dukkhena abhibhūtattā saṁviggamānasānaṁ
atk-abh02a3:29_6: dukkhanissaraṇagavesīnaṁ nissaraṇadassanena assāsajananatthaṁ nirodhaṁ. Tato nirodhādhigamatthaṁ
atk-abh02a3:30_0: ‘Ariyasaccesu yaṁ ñāṇaṁ tassa kiccato’ti saccañāṇakiccatopi vinicchayo veditabboti
atk-abh02a3:30_1: attho. Duvidhañhi saccañāṇaṁ – anubodhañāṇañca paṭivedhañāṇañca. Tattha anubodhañāṇaṁ
atk-abh02a3:30_2: lokiyaṁ anussavādivasena nirodhe magge ca pavattati. Paṭivedhañāṇaṁ lokuttaraṁ nirodhārammaṇaṁ
atk-abh02a3:30_3: katvā kiccato cattāripi saccāni paṭivijjhati. Yathāha – “yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ passati
atk-abh02a3:30_4: dukkhasamudayampi so passati, dukkhanirodhampi passati, dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadampi
atk-abh02a3:30_5: passatī”ti sabbaṁ vattabbaṁ. Yaṁ panetaṁ lokiyaṁ, tattha dukkhañāṇaṁ pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavanavasena
atk-abh02a3:30_6: pavattamānaṁ sakkāyadiṭṭhiṁ nivatteti, samudayañāṇaṁ ucchedadiṭṭhiṁ, nirodhañāṇaṁ
atk-abh02a3:30_7: sassatadiṭṭhiṁ, maggañāṇaṁ akiriyadiṭṭhiṁ; dukkhañāṇaṁ vā dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvarahitesu
atk-abh02a3:30_9: issarappadhānakālasabhāvādīhi loko pavattatīti akāraṇe kāraṇābhimānappavattaṁ hetumhi
atk-abh02a3:30_12: visuddhimaggaggāhavasena pavattaṁ upāye vippaṭipattiṁ nivatteti. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
atk-abh02a3:31: Loke lokappabhave, lokatthagame sive ca tadupāye;
atk-abh02a3:32: Sammuyhati tāva naro, na vijānāti yāva saccānīti.
atk-abh02a3:34_0: ‘Antogadhānaṁ pabhedā’ti dukkhasaccasmiñhi, ṭhapetvā taṇhañceva anāsavadhamme ca,
atk-abh02a3:34_1: sesā sabbadhammā antogadhā; samudayasacce chattiṁsa taṇhāvicaritāni; nirodhasaccaṁ
atk-abh02a3:34_3: Sammāsaṅkappāpadesena tayo nekkhammavitakkādayo, sammāvācāpadesena cattāri vacīsucaritāni,
atk-abh02a3:34_4: sammākammantāpadesena tīṇi kāyasucaritāni, sammāājīvamukhena appicchatā santuṭṭhitā
atk-abh02a3:34_5: ca, sabbesaṁyeva vā etesaṁ sammāvācākammantājīvānaṁ ariyakantasīlattā sīlassa ca
atk-abh02a3:34_6: saddhāhatthena paṭiggahetabbattā tesaṁ atthitāya ca atthibhāvato saddhindriyasaddhābalachandiddhipādā,
atk-abh02a3:35_0: ‘Upamāto’ti bhāro viya hi dukkhasaccaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ, bhārādānamiva samudayasaccaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:35_1: bhāranikkhepanamiva nirodhasaccaṁ, bhāranikkhepanūpāyo viya maggasaccaṁ; rogo viya
atk-abh02a3:35_2: ca dukkhasaccaṁ, roganidānamiva samudayasaccaṁ, rogavūpasamo viya nirodhasaccaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:35_3: bhesajjamiva maggasaccaṁ; dubbhikkhamiva vā dukkhasaccaṁ, dubbuṭṭhi viya samudayasaccaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:35_4: subhikkhamiva nirodhasaccaṁ, suvuṭṭhi viya maggasaccaṁ. Apica verīveramūlaverasamugghātaverasamugghātupāyehi,
atk-abh02a3:36_0: ‘Catukkato’ti atthi cettha dukkhaṁ na ariyasaccaṁ, atthi ariyasaccaṁ na dukkhaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:36_1: atthi dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca, atthi neva dukkhaṁ na ariyasaccaṁ. Esa nayo samudayādīsu.
atk-abh02a3:36_2: Tattha maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca “yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha”nti vacanato
atk-abh02a3:36_3: saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhaṁ na ariyasaccaṁ. Nirodho ariyasaccaṁ na dukkhaṁ. Itaraṁ
atk-abh02a3:36_4: pana ariyasaccadvayaṁ siyā dukkhaṁ aniccato, na pana yassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ
atk-abh02a3:36_5: vussati tathatthena. Sabbākārena pana upādānakkhandhapañcakaṁ dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca
atk-abh02a3:36_6: aññatra taṇhāya. Maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa pariññatthaṁ bhagavati
atk-abh02a3:36_7: brahmacariyaṁ vussati tathatthena neva dukkhaṁ na ariyasaccaṁ. Evaṁ samudayādīsupi
atk-abh02a3:37: ‘Suññatekavidhādīhī’ti ettha suññato tāva paramatthena hi sabbāneva saccāni vedakakārakanibbutagamakābhāvato suññānīti veditabbāni. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
atk-abh02a3:38: Dukkhameva hi na koci dukkhito, kārako na kiriyāva vijjati;
atk-abh02a3:39: Atthi nibbuti na nibbuto pumā, maggamatthi gamako na vijjatīti.
atk-abh02a3:43_0: Nirodhasuññāni vā tīṇi, nirodho ca sesattayasuñño. Phalasuñño vā ettha hetu samudaye
atk-abh02a3:43_1: dukkhassābhāvato magge ca nirodhassa, na phalena sagabbho pakativādīnaṁ pakati viya.
atk-abh02a3:43_2: Hetusuññañca phalaṁ dukkhasamudayānaṁ nirodhamaggānañca asamavāyā, na hetusamavetaṁ
atk-abh02a3:43_3: hetuphalaṁ hetuphalasamavāyavādīnaṁ dviaṇukādīni viya. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
atk-abh02a3:44: Tayamidha nirodhasuññaṁ, tayena tenāpi nibbuti suññā;
atk-abh02a3:45: Suñño phalena hetu, phalampi taṁ hetunā suññanti.
atk-abh02a3:47_0: ‘Ekavidhādīhī’ti sabbameva cettha dukkhaṁ ekavidhaṁ pavattibhāvato, duvidhaṁ nāmarūpato,
atk-abh02a3:47_2: pañcupādānakkhandhabhedato. Samudayopi ekavidho pavattakabhāvato, duvidho diṭṭhisampayuttāsampayuttato,
atk-abh02a3:47_4: rūpābhinandanādibhedato, chabbidho chataṇhākāyabhedato. Nirodhopi ekavidho asaṅkhatadhātubhāvato,
atk-abh02a3:47_5: pariyāyena pana duvidho saupādisesaanupādisesato, tividho bhavattayavūpasamato, catubbidho
atk-abh02a3:47_7: Maggopi ekavidho bhāvetabbato, duvidho samathavipassanābhedato dassanabhāvanābhedato
atk-abh02a3:47_8: vā, tividho khandhattayabhedato. Ayañhi sappadesattā nagaraṁ viya rajjena nippadesehi
atk-abh02a3:48_0: “Na kho, āvuso visākha, ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena tayo khandhā saṅgahitā. Tīhi
atk-abh02a3:48_1: ca kho, āvuso visākha, khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahito. Yā cāvuso visākha,
atk-abh02a3:48_2: sammāvācā, yo ca sammākammanto, yo ca sammāājīvo – ime dhammā sīlakkhandhe saṅgahitā;
atk-abh02a3:48_3: yo ca sammāvāyāmo, yā ca sammāsati, yo ca sammāsamādhi – ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe
atk-abh02a3:48_4: saṅgahitā; yā ca sammādiṭṭhi, yo ca sammāsaṅkappo – ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti.
atk-abh02a3:49_0: Ettha hi sammāvācādayo tayo sīlameva. Tasmā te sajātito sīlakkhandhena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh02a3:49_1: Kiñcāpi hi pāḷiyaṁ sīlakkhandheti bhummena niddeso kato, attho pana karaṇavaseneva
atk-abh02a3:49_2: veditabbo. Sammāvāyāmādīsu pana tīsu samādhi attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena
atk-abh02a3:49_3: appetuṁ na sakkoti, vīriye pana paggahakiccaṁ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṁ
atk-abh02a3:50_0: Tatrāyaṁ upamā – yathā hi nakkhattaṁ kīḷissāmāti uyyānaṁ paviṭṭhesu tīsu sahāyesu
atk-abh02a3:50_1: eko supupphitaṁ campakarukkhaṁ disvā hatthaṁ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṁ na sakkuṇeyya.
atk-abh02a3:50_2: Athassa dutiyo onamitvā piṭṭhiṁ dadeyya. So tassa piṭṭhiyaṁ ṭhatvāpi kampamāno gahetuṁ
atk-abh02a3:50_3: na sakkuṇeyya. Athassa itaro aṁsakūṭaṁ upanāmeyya. So ekassa piṭṭhiyaṁ ṭhatvā ekassa
atk-abh02a3:50_4: aṁsakūṭaṁ olubbha yathāruci pupphāni ocinitvā piḷandhitvā nakkhattaṁ kīḷeyya. Evaṁsampadamidaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:51_0: Ekato uyyānaṁ paviṭṭhā tayo sahāyā viya hi ekato jātā sammāvāyāmādayo tayo dhammā,
atk-abh02a3:51_1: supupphitacampakarukkho viya ārammaṇaṁ, hatthaṁ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṁ asakkonto viya
atk-abh02a3:51_2: attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṁ asakkonto samādhi, piṭṭhiṁ datvā
atk-abh02a3:51_3: onatasahāyo viya vāyāmo, aṁsakūṭaṁ datvā ṭhitasahāyo viya sati. Yathā tesu ekassa
atk-abh02a3:51_4: piṭṭhiyaṁ ṭhatvā ekassa aṁsakūṭaṁ olubbha itaro yathāruci pupphaṁ gahetuṁ sakkoti,
atk-abh02a3:51_5: evameva vīriye paggahakiccaṁ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṁ sādhentiyā laddhūpakāro
atk-abh02a3:51_6: samādhi sakkoti ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṁ. Tasmā samādhiyevettha sajātito samādhikkhandhena
atk-abh02a3:51_7: saṅgahito. Vāyāmasatiyo pana kiriyato saṅgahitā honti.

atk-abh02a3:62_0: 190. Idāni saṅkhepato uddiṭṭhāni dukkhādīni vibhajitvā dassetuṁ ayaṁ tattha katamaṁ
atk-abh02a3:62_1: dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ jātipi dukkhāti niddesavāro āraddho. Tattha jāti veditabbā, jātiyā
atk-abh02a3:62_2: dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo; jarā, maraṇaṁ, soko, paridevo, dukkhaṁ, domanassaṁ, upāyāso,
atk-abh02a3:62_3: appiyasampayogo, piyavippayogo veditabbo; appiyasampayogassa piyavippayogassa dukkhaṭṭho

atk-abh02a3:63_0: Tattha dukkhassa ariyasaccassa kathanatthāya ayaṁ mātikā – idañhi dukkhaṁ nāma anekaṁ
atk-abh02a3:63_1: nānappakāraṁ, seyyathidaṁ – dukkhadukkhaṁ, vipariṇāmadukkhaṁ, saṅkhāradukkhaṁ, paṭicchannadukkhaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:64_0: Tattha kāyikacetasikā dukkhavedanā sabhāvato ca nāmato ca dukkhattā ‘dukkhadukkhaṁ’
atk-abh02a3:64_1: nāma. Sukhavedanā vipariṇāmena dukkhuppattihetuto ‘vipariṇāmadukkhaṁ’ nāma. Upekkhāvedanā
atk-abh02a3:64_2: ceva avasesā ca tebhūmakā saṅkhārā udayabbayapīḷitattā ‘saṅkhāradukkhaṁ’ nāma. Tathā
atk-abh02a3:64_3: pīḷanaṁ pana maggaphalānampi atthi. Tasmā ete dhammā dukkhasaccapariyāpannattena
atk-abh02a3:64_5: kāyikacetasiko ābādho pucchitvā jānitabbato upakkamassa ca apākaṭabhāvato ‘paṭicchannadukkhaṁ’
atk-abh02a3:64_6: nāma, apākaṭadukkhantipi vuccati. Dvattiṁsakammakāraṇādisamuṭṭhāno ābādho apucchitvāva
atk-abh02a3:64_7: jānitabbato upakkamassa ca pākaṭabhāvato ‘appaṭicchannadukkhaṁ’ nāma, pākaṭadukkhantipi
atk-abh02a3:64_8: vuccati. Ṭhapetvā dukkhadukkhaṁ sesaṁ dukkhasaccavibhaṅge āgataṁ jātiādi sabbampi
atk-abh02a3:64_9: tassa tassa dukkhassa vatthubhāvato ‘pariyāyadukkhaṁ’ nāma. Dukkhadukkhaṁ ‘nippariyāyadukkhaṁ’ nāma.
atk-abh02a3:65_0: Tattha pariyāyadukkhaṁ nippariyāyadukkhanti imasmiṁ padadvaye ṭhatvā dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ
atk-abh02a3:65_1: kathetabbaṁ. Ariyasaccañca nāmetaṁ pāḷiyaṁ saṅkhepatopi āgacchati vitthāratopi. Saṅkhepato
atk-abh02a3:65_2: āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhepenapi vitthārenapi kathetuṁ vaṭṭati. Vitthārato āgataṭṭhāne pana
atk-abh02a3:65_3: vitthāreneva kathetuṁ vaṭṭati, na saṅkhepena. Taṁ idaṁ imasmiṁ ṭhāne vitthārena āgatanti
atk-abh02a3:65_4: vitthāreneva kathetabbaṁ. Tasmā yaṁ taṁ niddesavāre “tattha katamaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ?
atk-abh02a3:65_5: Jātipi dukkhā”tiādīni padāni gahetvā “jāti veditabbā, jātiyā dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo”tiādi
atk-abh02a3:65_6: vuttaṁ. Tattha jātiādīni tāva “tattha katamā jāti? Yā tesaṁ tesaṁ sattānaṁ tamhi
atk-abh02a3:65_7: tamhi sattanikāye jāti sañjātī”ti imassa pana padabhājanīyassa vasena veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a3:66_0: 191. Tatrāyaṁ atthavaṇṇanā – tesaṁ tesaṁ sattānanti ayaṁ saṅkhepato anekesaṁ sattānaṁ
atk-abh02a3:66_1: sādhāraṇaniddeso. Yā devadattassa jāti, yā somadattassa jātīti evañhi divasampi kathiyamāne
atk-abh02a3:66_2: neva sattā pariyādānaṁ gacchanti, na sabbaṁ aparatthadīpanaṁ sijjhati. Imehi pana
atk-abh02a3:66_3: dvīhi padehi na koci satto apariyādinno hoti, na kiñci aparatthadīpanaṁ na sijjhati.
atk-abh02a3:66_4: Tena vuttaṁ – “yā tesaṁ tesaṁ sattāna”nti. Tamhi tamhīti ayaṁ jātigativasena anekesaṁ
atk-abh02a3:66_5: sattanikāyānaṁ sādhāraṇaniddeso. Sattanikāyeti sattānaṁ nikāye, sattaghaṭāyaṁ sattasamūheti attho.
atk-abh02a3:67_0: Jātīti ayaṁ jātisaddo anekattho. Tathā hesa “ekampi jātiṁ, dvepi jātiyo”ti ettha
atk-abh02a3:67_1: bhave āgato. “Atthi visākhe, nigaṇṭhā nāma samaṇajātikā”ti ettha nikāye. “Tiriyā
atk-abh02a3:67_2: nāma tiṇajāti nābhiyā uggantvā nabhaṁ āhacca ṭhitā ahosī”ti ettha paññattiyaṁ. “Jāti
atk-abh02a3:67_3: dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahitā”ti ettha saṅkhatalakkhaṇe. “Yaṁ, bhikkhave, mātukucchimhi
atk-abh02a3:67_4: paṭhamaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ, paṭhamaṁ viññāṇaṁ pātubhūtaṁ, tadupādāya sāvassa jātī”ti
atk-abh02a3:67_5: ettha paṭisandhiyaṁ. “Sampatijāto, ānanda, bodhisatto”ti ettha pasūtiyaṁ. “Anupakkuṭṭho
atk-abh02a3:67_6: jātivādenā”ti ettha kule. “Yatohaṁ, bhagini, ariyāya jātiyā jāto”ti ettha ariyasīle.
atk-abh02a3:67_7: Idha panāyaṁ savikāresu paṭhamābhinibbattakkhandhesu vattati. Tasmā jāyamānakavasena
atk-abh02a3:67_8: jātīti idamettha sabhāvapaccattaṁ. Sañjāyanavasena sañjātīti upasaggena padaṁ vaḍḍhitaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:67_9: Okkamanavasena okkanti. Jāyanaṭṭhena vā jāti, sā aparipuṇṇāyatanavasena yuttā. Sañjāyanaṭṭhena
atk-abh02a3:67_10: sañjāti, sā paripuṇṇāyatanavasena yuttā. Okkamanaṭṭhena okkanti, sā aṇḍajajalābujavasena
atk-abh02a3:67_11: yuttā. Te hi aṇḍakosañca vatthikosañca okkamanti, okkamantāpi pavisantā viya paṭisandhiṁ
atk-abh02a3:67_12: gaṇhanti. Abhinibbattanaṭṭhena abhinibbatti. Sā saṁsedajaopapātikavasena yuttā. Te
atk-abh02a3:67_13: hi pākaṭā eva hutvā nibbattanti. Ayaṁ tāva sammutikathā.
atk-abh02a3:68_0: Idāni paramatthakathā hoti. Khandhā eva hi paramatthato pātubhavanti, na sattā. Tattha
atk-abh02a3:68_1: ca khandhānanti ekavokārabhave ekassa, catuvokārabhave catunnaṁ, pañcavokārabhave
atk-abh02a3:68_2: pañcannaṁ gahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ. Pātubhāvoti uppatti. Āyatanānanti ettha tatra tatra
atk-abh02a3:68_3: uppajjamānāyatanavasena saṅgaho veditabbo. Paṭilābhoti santatiyaṁ pātubhāvoyeva;
atk-abh02a3:68_4: pātubhavantāneva hi tāni paṭiladdhāni nāma honti. Ayaṁ vuccati jātīti ayaṁ jāti nāma
atk-abh02a3:68_5: kathiyati. Sā panesā tattha tattha bhave paṭhamābhinibbattilakkhaṇā, nīyyātanarasā,
atk-abh02a3:68_6: atītabhavato idha ummujjanapaccupaṭṭhānā, phalavasena dukkhavicittatāpaccupaṭṭhānā vā.
atk-abh02a3:69_0: Idāni ‘jātiyā dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ayañhi jāti sayaṁ na dukkhā, dukkhuppattiyā
atk-abh02a3:69_1: pana vatthubhāvena dukkhāti vuttā. Kataradukkhassa panāyaṁ vatthūti? Yaṁ taṁ bālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu
atk-abh02a3:69_2: bhagavatāpi upamāvasena pakāsitaṁ āpāyikaṁdukkhaṁ, yañca sugatiyaṁ manussaloke gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṁ
atk-abh02a3:69_3: dukkhaṁ uppajjati, tassa sabbassāpi esā vatthu. Tatridaṁ gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṁ
atk-abh02a3:69_4: dukkhaṁ – ayañhi satto mātukucchimhi nibbattamāno na uppalapadumapuṇḍarīkādīsu nibbattati.
atk-abh02a3:69_5: Atha kho heṭṭhā āmāsayassa upari pakkāsayassa udarapaṭalapiṭṭhikaṇḍakānaṁ vemajjhe
atk-abh02a3:69_7: adhimattajegucche kucchippadese pūtimacchapūtikummāsacandanikādīsu kimi viya nibbattati.
atk-abh02a3:69_8: So tattha nibbatto dasa māse mātukucchisambhavena usmanā puṭapākaṁ viya paccamāno
atk-abh02a3:69_9: piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya sediyamāno samiñjanapasāraṇādirahito adhimattaṁ dukkhaṁ paccanubhotīti.
atk-abh02a3:70_0: Yaṁ pana so mātu sahasā upakkhalanagamananisīdanauṭṭhānaparivattanādīsu surādhuttahatthagato
atk-abh02a3:70_1: eḷako viya ahiguṇṭhikahatthagato sappapotako viya ca ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanaodhunananiddhunanādinā
atk-abh02a3:70_2: upakkamena adhimattaṁ dukkhamanubhavati, yañca mātu sītudakapānakāle sītanarakūpapanno
atk-abh02a3:70_4: khārāpaṭicchakādikammakāraṇappatto viya tibbaṁ dukkhamanubhoti – idaṁ ‘gabbhapariharaṇamūlakaṁ’ dukkhaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:71_0: Yaṁ panassa mūḷhagabbhāya mātuyā mittāmaccasuhajjādīhipi adassanārahe dukkhuppattiṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a3:71_1: chedanaphālanādīhi dukkhaṁ uppajjati – idaṁ ‘gabbhavipattimūlakaṁ’ dukkhaṁ. Yaṁ vijāyamānāya
atk-abh02a3:71_2: mātuyā kammajehi vātehi parivattetvā narakapapātaṁ viya atibhayānakaṁ yonimaggaṁ
atk-abh02a3:71_3: paṭipātiyamānassa paramasambādhena yonimukhena tāḷacchiggaḷena viya nikkaḍḍhiyamānassa
atk-abh02a3:71_4: mahānāgassa narakasattassa viya ca saṅghāṭapabbatehi vicuṇṇiyamānassa dukkhaṁ uppajjati
atk-abh02a3:71_5: – idaṁ ‘vijāyanamūlakaṁ’ dukkhaṁ. Yaṁ pana jātassa taruṇavaṇasadisassa sukumārasarīrassa
atk-abh02a3:71_7: dukkhaṁ uppajjati – idaṁ mātukucchito ‘bahi nikkhamanamūlakaṁ’ dukkhaṁ. Yaṁ tato
atk-abh02a3:71_8: paraṁ pavattiyaṁ attanāva attānaṁ vadhantassa, acelakavatādivasena ātāpanaparitāpanānuyogamanuyuttassa,
atk-abh02a3:71_9: kodhavasena abhuñjantassa, ubbandhantassa ca dukkhaṁ hoti – idaṁ ‘attūpakkamamūlakaṁ’ dukkhaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:72_0: Yaṁ pana parato vadhabandhanādīni anubhavantassa dukkhaṁ uppajjati – idaṁ ‘parūpakkamamūlakaṁ’
atk-abh02a3:72_1: dukkhanti. Iti imassa sabbassāpi dukkhassa ayaṁ jāti vatthumeva hotīti. Tenetaṁ vuccati –

atk-abh02a3:101_0: Tattha savīcijarā upādinnānupādinnakavasena evaṁ dīpetabbā – daharakumārakānañhi
atk-abh02a3:101_1: paṭhamameva khīradantā nāma uṭṭhahanti, na te thirā. Tesu pana patitesu puna dantā
atk-abh02a3:101_2: uṭṭhahanti. Te paṭhamameva setā honti, jarāvātena pana pahaṭakāle kāḷakā honti. Kesā
atk-abh02a3:101_3: pana paṭhamameva tambāpi honti kāḷakāpi setāpi. Chavi pana salohitikā hoti. Vaḍḍhantānaṁ
atk-abh02a3:101_4: vaḍḍhantānaṁ odātānaṁ odātabhāvo, kāḷakānaṁ kāḷakabhāvo paññāyati, jarāvātena pana
atk-abh02a3:101_5: pahaṭakāle vaḷiṁ gaṇhāti. Sabbampi sassaṁ vapitakāle setaṁ hoti, pacchā nīlaṁ, jarāvātena
atk-abh02a3:101_6: pana pahaṭakāle paṇḍukaṁ hoti. Ambaṅkurenāpi dīpetuṁ vaṭṭati eva. Ayaṁ vuccati jarāti
atk-abh02a3:101_7: ayaṁ jarā nāma kathiyati. Sā panesā khandhaparipākalakkhaṇā, maraṇūpanayanarasā,
atk-abh02a3:102_0: ‘Jarāya dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ayampi sayaṁ na dukkhā, dukkhassa pana
atk-abh02a3:102_1: vatthubhāvena dukkhāti vuttā. Katarassa dukkhassa? Kāyadukkhassa ceva domanassadukkhassa
atk-abh02a3:102_2: ca. Jiṇṇassa hi attabhāvo jarasakaṭaṁ viya dubbalo hoti, ṭhātuṁ vā gantuṁ vā nisīdituṁ
atk-abh02a3:102_3: vā vāyamantassa balavaṁ kāyadukkhaṁ uppajjati; puttadāre yathāpure asallakkhente
atk-abh02a3:102_4: domanassaṁ uppajjati. Iti imesaṁ dvinnampi dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvena dukkhāti veditabbā. Apica –
atk-abh02a3:107: Pappoti dukkhaṁ yaṁ macco, kāyikaṁ mānasaṁ tathā;
atk-abh02a3:108: Sabbametaṁ jarāhetu, yasmā tasmā jarā dukhāti.
atk-abh02a3:110_1: Cavanatāti bhāvavacanena lakkhaṇanidassanaṁ. Bhedoti cutikhandhānaṁ bhaṅguppattiparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:110_2: Antaradhānanti ghaṭassa viya bhinnassa bhinnānaṁ cutikhandhānaṁ yena kenaci pariyāyena
atk-abh02a3:110_3: ṭhānābhāvaparidīpanaṁ. Maccu maraṇanti maccusaṅkhātaṁ maraṇaṁ. Kālo nāma antako,
atk-abh02a3:110_4: tassa kiriyā kālakiriyā. Ettāvatā sammutiyā maraṇaṁ dīpitaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a3:111_0: Idāni paramatthena dīpetuṁ khandhānaṁ bhedotiādimāha. Paramatthena hi khandhāyeva
atk-abh02a3:111_1: bhijjanti, na satto nāma koci marati. Khandhesu pana bhijjamānesu satto marati bhinnesu
atk-abh02a3:111_2: matoti vohāro hoti. Ettha ca catupañcavokāravasena khandhānaṁ bhedo, ekavokāravasena
atk-abh02a3:111_3: kaḷevarassa nikkhepo; catuvokāravasena vā khandhānaṁ bhedo, sesadvayavasena kaḷevarassa
atk-abh02a3:111_4: nikkhepo veditabbo. Kasmā? Bhavadvayepi rūpakāyasaṅkhātassa kaḷevarassa sambhavato.
atk-abh02a3:111_5: Yasmā vā cātumahārājikādīsu khandhā bhijjanteva, na kiñci nikkhipati, tasmā tesaṁ
atk-abh02a3:111_6: vasena khandhānaṁ bhedo. Manussādīsu kaḷevarassa nikkhepo. Ettha ca kaḷevarassa nikkhepakaraṇato
atk-abh02a3:112_0: Jīvitindriyassa upacchedoti iminā indriyabaddhasseva maraṇaṁ nāma hoti, anindriyabaddhassa
atk-abh02a3:112_1: maraṇaṁ nāma natthīti dasseti. ‘Sassaṁ mataṁ, rukkho mato’ti idaṁ pana vohāramattameva.
atk-abh02a3:112_2: Atthato pana evarūpāni vacanāni sassādīnaṁ khayavayabhāvameva dīpenti. Idaṁ vuccati
atk-abh02a3:112_3: maraṇanti idaṁ sabbampi maraṇaṁ nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a3:113_0: Apicettha khaṇikamaraṇaṁ, sammutimaraṇaṁ, samucchedamaraṇanti ayampi bhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a3:113_1: Tattha ‘khaṇikamaraṇaṁ’ nāma pavatte rūpārūpadhammānaṁ bhedo. ‘Tisso mato, phusso
atk-abh02a3:113_2: mato’ti idaṁ ‘sammutimaraṇaṁ’ nāma. Khīṇāsavassa appaṭisandhikā kālakiriyā ‘samucchedamaraṇaṁ’
atk-abh02a3:113_3: nāma. Imasmiṁ panatthe sammutimaraṇaṁ adhippetaṁ. Jātikkhayamaraṇaṁ, upakkamamaraṇaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:113_4: sarasamaraṇaṁ, āyukkhayamaraṇaṁ, puññakkhayamaraṇantipi tasseva nāmaṁ. Tayidaṁ cutilakkhaṇaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:114_0: ‘Maraṇassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana idampi sayaṁ na dukkhaṁ, dukkhassa
atk-abh02a3:114_1: pana vatthubhāvena dukkhanti vuttaṁ. Maraṇantikāpi hi sārīrikā vedanā, paṭivāte gahitā
atk-abh02a3:114_2: ādittatiṇukkā viya, sarīraṁ nidahanti. Narakanimittādīnaṁ upaṭṭhānakāle balavadomanassaṁ
atk-abh02a3:114_3: uppajjati. Iti imesaṁ dvinnampi dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvena dukkhanti veditabbaṁ. Api ca –
atk-abh02a3:122_0: Apica imāni jātijarāmaraṇāni nāma imesaṁ sattānaṁ vadhakapaccāmittā viya otāraṁ gavesantāni
atk-abh02a3:122_1: vicaranti. Yathā hi purisassa tīsu paccāmittesu otārāpekkhesu vicarantesu eko vadeyya
atk-abh02a3:122_2: – “ahaṁ asukaaraññassa nāma vaṇṇaṁ kathetvā etaṁ ādāya tattha gamissāmi, ettha mayhaṁ
atk-abh02a3:122_3: dukkaraṁ natthī”ti. Dutiyo vadeyya “ahaṁ tava etaṁ gahetvā gatakāle pothetvā dubbalaṁ
atk-abh02a3:122_4: karissāmi, ettha mayhaṁ dukkaraṁ natthī”ti. Tatiyo vadeyya – “tayā etasmiṁ pothetvā
atk-abh02a3:122_5: dubbale kate tiṇhena asinā sīsacchedanaṁ nāma mayhaṁ bhāro hotū”ti. Te evaṁ vatvā tathā kareyyuṁ.
atk-abh02a3:123_0: Tattha paṭhamapaccāmittassa araññassa vaṇṇaṁ kathetvā taṁ ādāya tattha gatakālo viya
atk-abh02a3:123_1: suhajjañātimaṇḍalato nikkaḍḍhitvā yattha katthaci nibbattāpanaṁ nāma jātiyā kiccaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:123_2: Dutiyassa pothetvā dubbalakaraṇaṁ viya nibbattakkhandhesu nipatitvā parādhīnamañcaparāyaṇabhāvakaraṇaṁ
atk-abh02a3:123_3: jarāya kiccaṁ. Tatiyassa tiṇhena asinā sīsacchedanaṁ viya jīvitakkhayapāpanaṁ maraṇassa
atk-abh02a3:124_0: Apicettha jātidukkhaṁ sādīnavamahākantārappaveso viya daṭṭhabbaṁ. Jarādukkhaṁ tattha
atk-abh02a3:124_1: annapānarahitassa dubbalyaṁ viya daṭṭhabbaṁ. Maraṇadukkhaṁ dubbalassa iriyāpathapavattane
atk-abh02a3:126_0: 194.Sokaniddese byasatīti byasanaṁ; hitasukhaṁ khipati viddhaṁsetīti attho. Ñātīnaṁ
atk-abh02a3:126_1: byasanaṁ ñātibyasanaṁ; corarogabhayādīhi ñātikkhayo ñātivināsoti attho. Tena ñātibyasanena
atk-abh02a3:126_2: phuṭṭhassāti ajjhotthaṭassa abhibhūtassa samannāgatassāti attho. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a3:126_3: Ayaṁ pana viseso – bhogānaṁ byasanaṁ bhogabyasanaṁ; rājacorādivasena bhogakkhayo
atk-abh02a3:126_4: bhogavināsoti attho. Rogoyeva byasanaṁ rogabyasanaṁ; rogo hi ārogyaṁ byasati vināsetīti
atk-abh02a3:126_5: byasanaṁ. Sīlassa byasanaṁ sīlabyasanaṁ; dussīlyassetaṁ nāmaṁ. Sammādiṭṭhiṁ vināsayamānā
atk-abh02a3:126_6: uppannā diṭṭhiyeva byasanaṁ diṭṭhibyasanaṁ. Ettha ca purimāni dve anipphannāni, pacchimāni
atk-abh02a3:126_7: tīṇi nipphannāni tilakkhaṇabbhāhatāni. Purimāni ca tīṇi neva kusalāni na akusalāni.
atk-abh02a3:127_0: Aññataraññatarenāti gahitesu vā yena kenaci aggahitesu vā mittāmaccabyasanādīsu yena
atk-abh02a3:127_1: kenaci. Samannāgatassāti samanubandhassa aparimuccamānassa. Aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammenāti
atk-abh02a3:127_2: yena kenaci sokadukkhassa uppattihetunā. Sokoti socanakavasena soko; idaṁ tehi kāraṇehi
atk-abh02a3:127_3: upajjanakasokassa sabhāvapaccattaṁ. Socanāti socanākaro. Socitattanti socitabhāvo.
atk-abh02a3:127_4: Antosokoti abbhantare soko. Dutiyapadaṁ upasaggavasena vaḍḍhitaṁ. So hi abbhantare
atk-abh02a3:127_5: sukkhāpento viya parisukkhāpento viya uppajjatīti “antosoko antoparisoko”ti vuccati.
atk-abh02a3:128_0: Cetaso parijjhāyanāti cittassa jhāyanākāro. Soko hi uppajjamāno aggi viya cittaṁ
atk-abh02a3:128_1: jhāpeti paridahati, “cittaṁ me jhāmaṁ, na me kiñci paṭibhātī”ti vadāpeti. Dukkhito
atk-abh02a3:128_2: mano dummano, tassa bhāvo domanassaṁ. Anupaviṭṭhaṭṭhena sokova sallanti sokasallaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:128_3: Ayaṁ vuccati sokoti ayaṁ soko nāma kathiyati. So panāyaṁ kiñcāpi atthato domanassavedanāva
atk-abh02a3:128_4: hoti, evaṁ santepi antonijjhānalakkhaṇo, cetaso parinijjhāyanaraso, anusocanapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-abh02a3:129_0: ‘Sokassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ayaṁ sabhāvadukkhattā ceva dukkhassa
atk-abh02a3:129_1: ca vatthubhāvena dukkhoti vutto. Kataradukkhassāti? Kāyikadukkhassa ceva javanakkhaṇe
atk-abh02a3:129_2: ca domanassadukkhassa. Sokavegena hi hadaye mahāgaṇḍo uṭṭhahitvā paripaccitvā bhijjati,
atk-abh02a3:129_3: mukhato vā kāḷalohitaṁ nikkhamati, balavaṁ kāyadukkhaṁ uppajjati. “Ettakā me ñātayo
atk-abh02a3:129_4: khayaṁ gatā, ettakā me bhogā”ti cintentassa ca balavaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati. Iti
atk-abh02a3:129_5: imesaṁ dvinnaṁ dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvenapesa dukkhoti veditabbo. Apica –
atk-abh02a3:130: Sattānaṁ hadayaṁ soko, sallaṁ viya vitujjati;
atk-abh02a3:133: Dukkhampi vividhaṁ yasmā, tasmā dukkhoti vuccatīti.
atk-abh02a3:135_0: 195.Paridevaniddese ‘mayhaṁ dhītā, mayhaṁ putto’ti evaṁ ādissa ādissa devanti rodanti
atk-abh02a3:135_1: etenāti ādevo. Taṁ taṁ vaṇṇaṁ parikittetvā parikittetvā devanti etenāti paridevo.
atk-abh02a3:135_2: Tato parāni dve dve padāni purimadvayasseva ākārabhāvaniddesavasena vuttāni. Vācāti
atk-abh02a3:135_3: vacanaṁ. Palāpoti tucchaṁ niratthakavacanaṁ. Upaḍḍhabhaṇitaaññabhaṇitādivasena virūpo
atk-abh02a3:135_4: palāpo vippalāpo. Lālappoti punappunaṁ lapanaṁ. Lālappanākāro lālappanā. Lālappitassa
atk-abh02a3:135_5: bhāvo lālappitattaṁ. Ayaṁ vuccati paridevoti ayaṁ paridevo nāma kathiyati. So lālappanalakkhaṇo,
atk-abh02a3:136_0: ‘Paridevassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ayampi sayaṁ na dukkho, kāyadukkhadomanassadukkhānaṁ
atk-abh02a3:136_1: pana vatthubhāvena dukkhoti vutto. Paridevanto hi attano khandhaṁ muṭṭhīhi potheti,
atk-abh02a3:136_2: ubhohi hatthehi uraṁ paharati piṁsati, sīsena bhittiyā saddhiṁ yujjhati. Tenassa
atk-abh02a3:136_3: balavaṁ kāyadukkhaṁ uppajjati. ‘Ettakā me ñātayo khayaṁ vayaṁ abbhatthaṁ gatā’tiādīni
atk-abh02a3:136_4: cinteti. Tenassa balavaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati. Iti imesaṁ dvinnampi dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvena
atk-abh02a3:142: 196-7.Dukkhadomanassaniddesā heṭṭhā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṁ vaṇṇitattā pākaṭā eva. Lakkhaṇādīni pana tesaṁ tattha vuttāneva.
atk-abh02a3:143_0: ‘Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo, domanassassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana
atk-abh02a3:143_1: ubhayampetaṁ sayañca dukkhattā kāyikacetasikadukkhānañca vatthubhāvena dukkhanti
atk-abh02a3:143_2: vuttaṁ. Hatthapādānañhi kaṇṇanāsikānañca chedanadukkhena dukkhitassa, anāthasālāyaṁ
atk-abh02a3:143_3: ucchiṭṭhakapālaṁ purato katvā nipannassa, vaṇamukhehi puḷuvakesu nikkhamantesu balavaṁ
atk-abh02a3:143_4: kāyadukkhaṁ uppajjati; nānāraṅgarattavatthamanuññālaṅkāraṁ nakkhattaṁ kīḷantaṁ mahājanaṁ
atk-abh02a3:143_5: disvā balavadomanassaṁ uppajjati. Evaṁ tāva dukkhassa dvinnampi dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvo veditabbo. Apica –
atk-abh02a3:144: Pīḷeti kāyikamidaṁ, dukkhaṁ dukkhañca mānasaṁ bhiyyo;
atk-abh02a3:145: Janayati yasmā tasmā, dukkhanti visesato vuttanti.
atk-abh02a3:146_0: Cetodukkhasamappitā pana kese pakiriya urāni patipisenti, āvaṭṭanti, vivaṭṭanti,
atk-abh02a3:146_1: chinnapapātaṁ papatanti, satthaṁ āharanti, visaṁ khādanti, rajjuyā ubbandhanti, aggiṁ
atk-abh02a3:146_2: pavisanti. Taṁ taṁ viparītaṁ vatthuṁ tathā tathā vippaṭisārino pariḍayhamānacittā
atk-abh02a3:146_3: cintenti. Evaṁ domanassassa ubhinnampi dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvo veditabbo. Apica –
atk-abh02a3:147: Pīḷeti yato cittaṁ, kāyassa ca pīḷanaṁ samāvahati;
atk-abh02a3:150_1: nāmaṁ. Balavaṁ āyāso upāyāso. Āyāsitabhāvo āyāsitattaṁ. Upāyāsitabhāvo upāyāsitattaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:150_2: Ayaṁ vuccati upāyāsoti ayaṁ upāyāso nāma kathiyati. So panesa byāsattilakkhaṇo, nitthunanaraso,
atk-abh02a3:151_0: ‘Upāyāsassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ayampi sayaṁ na dukkho, ubhinnampi
atk-abh02a3:151_1: dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvena dukkhoti vutto. Kupitena hi raññā issariyaṁ acchinditvā hataputtabhātikānaṁ
atk-abh02a3:151_2: āṇattavadhānaṁ bhayena aṭaviṁ pavisitvā nilīnānaṁ mahāvisādappattānaṁ dukkhaṭṭhānena
atk-abh02a3:151_3: dukkhaseyyāya dukkhanisajjāya balavaṁ kāyadukkhaṁ uppajjati. ‘Ettakā no ñātakā, ettakā
atk-abh02a3:151_4: bhogā naṭṭhā’ti cintentānaṁ balavadomanassaṁ uppajjati. Iti imesaṁ dvinnampi dukkhānaṁ
atk-abh02a3:152: Cittassa paridahanā, kāyassa visādanā ca adhimattaṁ;
atk-abh02a3:153: Yaṁ dukkhamupāyāso, janeti dukkho tato vutto.
atk-abh02a3:154_0: Ettha ca mandagginā antobhājaneyeva telādīnaṁ pāko viya soko. Tikkhagginā paccamānassa
atk-abh02a3:154_1: bhājanato bahinikkhamanaṁ viya paridevo. Bahinikkhantāvasesassa nikkhamitumpi appahontassa
atk-abh02a3:154_2: antobhājaneyeva yāva parikkhayā pāko viya upāyāso daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a3:156_0: 199.Appiyasampayoganiddese yassāti ye assa. Aniṭṭhāti apariyesitā. Pariyesitā vā
atk-abh02a3:156_1: hontu apariyesitā vā, nāmamevetaṁ amanāpārammaṇānaṁ. Manasmiṁ na kamanti, na pavisantīti
atk-abh02a3:156_2: akantā. Manasmiṁ na appiyanti, na vā manaṁ vaḍḍhentīti amanāpā. Rūpātiādi tesaṁ sabhāvanidassanaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:156_3: Anatthaṁ kāmenti icchantīti anatthakāmā. Ahitaṁ kāmenti icchantīti ahitakāmā. Aphāsukaṁ
atk-abh02a3:156_4: dukkhavihāraṁ kāmenti icchantīti aphāsukakāmā. Catūhi yogehi khemaṁ nibbhayaṁ vivaṭṭaṁ
atk-abh02a3:156_5: na icchanti, sabhayaṁ vaṭṭameva nesaṁ kāmenti icchantīti āyogakkhemakāmā.
atk-abh02a3:157_0: Apica saddhādīnaṁ vuddhisaṅkhātassa atthassa akāmanato tesaṁyeva hānisaṅkhātassa
atk-abh02a3:157_1: anatthassa ca kāmanato anatthakāmā. Saddhādīnaṁyeva upāyabhūtassa hitassa akāmanato
atk-abh02a3:157_2: saddhāhāniādīnaṁ upāyabhūtassa ahitassa ca kāmanato ahitakāmā. Phāsukavihārassa akāmanato
atk-abh02a3:157_3: aphāsukavihārassa ca kāmanato aphāsukakāmā. Yassa kassaci nibbhayassa akāmanato bhayassa
atk-abh02a3:157_4: ca kāmanato ayogakkhemakāmāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a3:158_0: Saṅgatīti gantvā saṁyogo. Samāgamoti āgatehi saṁyogo. Samodhānanti ṭhānanisajjādīsu
atk-abh02a3:158_1: sahabhāvo. Missībhāvoti sabbakiccānaṁ sahakaraṇaṁ. Ayaṁ sattavasena yojanā. Saṅkhāravasena
atk-abh02a3:158_2: pana yaṁ labbhati taṁ gahetabbaṁ. Ayaṁ vuccatīti ayaṁ appiyasampayogo nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a3:159_0: So atthato eko dhammo nāma natthi. Kevalaṁ appiyasampayuttānaṁ duvidhassāpi dukkhassa
atk-abh02a3:159_1: vatthubhāvato dukkhoti vutto. Aniṭṭhāni hi vatthūni samodhānagatāni vijjhanachedanaphālanādīhi
atk-abh02a3:159_2: kāyikampi dukkhaṁ uppādenti, ubbegajananato mānasampi. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
atk-abh02a3:160: Disvāva appiye dukkhaṁ, paṭhamaṁ hoti cetasi;

atk-abh02a3:165_2: Tathā bhaginī. Mettāyantīti mittā, minantīti vā mittā; sabbaguyhesu anto pakkhipantīti
atk-abh02a3:165_3: attho. Kiccakaraṇīyesu sahabhāvaṭṭhena amā hontīti amaccā. Ayaṁ amhākaṁ ajjhattikoti
atk-abh02a3:165_4: evaṁ jānanti ñāyantīti vā ñātī. Lohitena sambandhāti sālohitā. Evametāni padāni atthato
atk-abh02a3:165_5: veditabbāni. Ayaṁ vuccatīti ayaṁ piyehi vippayogo nāma kathiyati. So iṭṭhavatthuviyogalakkhaṇo,
atk-abh02a3:166_0: So atthato eko dhammo nāma natthi. Kevalaṁ piyavippayuttānaṁ duvidhassāpi dukkhassa
atk-abh02a3:166_1: vatthubhāvato dukkhoti vutto. Iṭṭhāni hi vatthūni viyujjamānāni sarīrassa sosanamilāpanādibhāvena
atk-abh02a3:166_2: kāyikampi dukkhaṁ uppādenti, ‘yampi no ahosi, tampi no natthī’ti anusocāpanato mānasampi. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
atk-abh02a3:168: Bālā yato tato yaṁ, dukkhoti mato piyaviyogoti.
atk-abh02a3:170_1: taṇhā uppajjati. Aho vatāti patthanā. Nakho panetaṁ icchāya pattabbanti yaṁ etaṁ
atk-abh02a3:170_2: “aho vata mayaṁ na jātidhammā assāma, na ca vata no jāti āgaccheyyā”ti evaṁ pahīnasamudayesu
atk-abh02a3:170_3: sādhūsu vijjamānaṁ ajātidhammattaṁ, parinibbutesu ca vijjamānaṁ jātiyā anāgamanaṁ
atk-abh02a3:170_4: icchitaṁ, taṁ icchantassāpi maggabhāvanāya vinā apattabbato anicchantassa ca bhāvanāya
atk-abh02a3:170_5: pattabbato na icchāya pattabbaṁ nāma hoti. Idampīti etampi; upari sesāni upādāya
atk-abh02a3:170_6: pikāro. Yampicchanti yenapi dhammena alabbhaneyyaṁ vatthuṁ icchanto na labhati, taṁ
atk-abh02a3:170_7: alabbhaneyyavatthuicchanaṁ dukkhanti veditabbaṁ. Jarādhammānantiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a3:170_8: Evamettha alabbhaneyyavatthūsu icchāva “yampicchaṁ na labhati tampi dukkha”nti vuttā.
atk-abh02a3:171_0: Dvinnaṁ pana dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvato dukkhāti vuttā. Ekacco hi rājā bhavissatīti
atk-abh02a3:171_1: sambhāvito hoti. So chinnabhinnagaṇena parivārito pabbatavisamaṁ vā vanagahanaṁ vā
atk-abh02a3:171_2: pavisati. Atha rājā taṁ pavattiṁ ñatvā balakāyaṁ peseti. So rājapurisehi nihataparivāro
atk-abh02a3:171_3: sayampi laddhappahāro palāyamāno rukkhantaraṁ vā pāsāṇantaraṁ vā pavisati. Tasmiṁ
atk-abh02a3:171_4: samaye mahāmegho uṭṭhahati, tibbandhakārā kāḷavaddalikā hoti. Atha naṁ samantato
atk-abh02a3:171_5: kāḷakipillikādayo pāṇā parivāretvā gaṇhanti. Tenassa balavakāyadukkhaṁ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a3:171_6: ‘Maṁ ekaṁ nissāya ettakā ñātī ca bhogā ca vinaṭṭhā’ti cintentassa balavadomanassaṁ
atk-abh02a3:171_7: uppajjati. Iti ayaṁ icchā imesaṁ dvinnampi dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvena dukkhāti veditabbā. Apica –
atk-abh02a3:172: Taṁ taṁ patthayamānānaṁ, tassa tassa alābhato;
atk-abh02a3:173: Yaṁ vighātamayaṁ dukkhaṁ, sattānaṁ idha jāyati.
atk-abh02a3:177_0: 202.Upādānakkhandhaniddese saṁkhittenāti desanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Dukkhañhi ettakāni
atk-abh02a3:177_1: dukkhasatānīti vā ettakāni dukkhasahassānīti vā ettakāni dukkhasatasahassānīti vā
atk-abh02a3:177_2: saṁkhipituṁ na sakkā, desanā pana sakkā, tasmā “dukkhaṁ nāma aññaṁ kiñci natthi,
atk-abh02a3:177_3: saṁkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti desanaṁ saṅkhipento evamāha. Seyyathidanti
atk-abh02a3:177_4: nipāto; tassa te katameti ceti attho. Rūpūpādānakkhandhotiādīnaṁ attho khandhavibhaṅge vaṇṇitoyeva.
atk-abh02a3:179: Jātippabhutikaṁ dukkhaṁ, yaṁ vuttaṁ idha tādinā;
atk-abh02a3:180: Avuttaṁ yañca taṁ sabbaṁ, vinā ete na vijjati.
atk-abh02a3:183_0: Tathā hi indhanamiva pāvako, lakkhamiva paharaṇāni, gorūpamiva ḍaṁsamakasādayo, khettamiva
atk-abh02a3:183_1: lāvakā, gāmaṁ viya gāmaghātakā, upādānakkhandhapañcakameva jātiādayo nānappakārehi
atk-abh02a3:183_2: bādhayamānā, tiṇalatādīni viya bhūmiyaṁ, pupphaphalapallavādīni viya rukkhesu, upādānakkhandhesuyeva
atk-abh02a3:183_3: nibbattanti. Upādānakkhandhānañca ādidukkhaṁ jāti, majjhedukkhaṁ jarā, pariyosānadukkhaṁ
atk-abh02a3:183_4: maraṇaṁ. Māraṇantikadukkhābhighātena pariḍayhamānadukkhaṁ soko, tadasahanato lālappanadukkhaṁ
atk-abh02a3:183_6: dukkhaṁ. Tena bādhiyamānānaṁ puthujjanānaṁ tattha paṭighuppattito cetobādhanadukkhaṁ
atk-abh02a3:183_7: domanassaṁ. Sokādivuḍḍhiyā janitavisādānaṁ anutthunanadukkhaṁ upāyāso. Manorathavighātappattānaṁ
atk-abh02a3:183_8: icchāvighātadukkhaṁ icchitālābhoti evaṁ nānappakārato upaparikkhiyamānā upādānakkhandhāva
atk-abh02a3:183_9: dukkhāti yadetaṁ ekamekaṁ dassetvā vuccamānaṁ anekehi kappehi na sakkā asesato vattuṁ,
atk-abh02a3:183_10: taṁ sabbampi dukkhaṁ ekajalabindumhi sakalasamuddajalarasaṁ viya yesu kesuci pañcasu
atk-abh02a3:183_11: upādānakkhandhesu saṅkhipitvā dassetuṁ “saṁkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti bhagavā avocāti.
atk-abh02a3:186_0: 203.Samudayasaccaniddese yāyaṁ taṇhāti yā ayaṁ taṇhā. Ponobbhavikāti punabbhavakaraṇaṁ
atk-abh02a3:186_1: punobbhavo, punobbhavo sīlamassāti ponobbhavikā. Apica punabbhavaṁ deti, punabbhavāya
atk-abh02a3:186_2: saṁvattati, punappunaṁ bhave nibbattetīti ponobbhavikā. Sā panesā punabbhavassa dāyikāpi
atk-abh02a3:186_3: atthi adāyikāpi, punabbhavāya saṁvattanikāpi atthi asaṁvattanikāpi, dinnāya paṭisandhiyā
atk-abh02a3:186_4: upadhivepakkamattāpi. Sā punabbhavaṁ dadamānāpi adadamānāpi, punabbhavāya saṁvattamānāpi
atk-abh02a3:186_5: asaṁvattamānāpi, dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkamattāpi ponobbhavikā evāti nāmaṁ
atk-abh02a3:186_6: labhati. Abhinandanasaṅkhātena nandirāgena sahagatāti nandirāgasahagatā, nandirāgena
atk-abh02a3:186_7: saddhiṁ atthato ekattameva gatāti vuttaṁ hoti. Tatratatrābhinandinīti yatra yatra
atk-abh02a3:186_8: attabhāvo tatratatrābhinandinī, rūpādīsu vā ārammaṇesu tatratatrābhinandinī; rūpābhinandinī
atk-abh02a3:186_10: katamāti ceti attho. Kāmataṇhāti kāme taṇhā kāmataṇhā; pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassetaṁ
atk-abh02a3:186_11: adhivacanaṁ. Bhave taṇhā bhavataṇhā; bhavapatthanāvasena uppannassa sassatadiṭṭhisahagatassa
atk-abh02a3:186_12: rūpārūpabhavarāgassa ca jhānanikantiyā cetaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Vibhave taṇhā vibhavataṇhā;
atk-abh02a3:187_0: Idāni tassā taṇhāya vatthuṁ vitthārato dassetuṁ sā kho panesātiādimāha. Tattha uppajjatīti
atk-abh02a3:187_1: jāyati. Nivisatīti punappunaṁ pavattivasena patiṭṭhahati. Yaṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpanti
atk-abh02a3:187_2: yaṁ lokasmiṁ piyasabhāvañceva madhurasabhāvañca. Cakkhuṁ loketiādīsu lokasmiñhi cakkhādīsu
atk-abh02a3:187_3: mamattena abhiniviṭṭhā sattā sampattiyaṁ patiṭṭhitā attano cakkhuṁ ādāsādīsu nimittaggahaṇānusārena
atk-abh02a3:187_4: vippasannapañcapasādaṁ suvaṇṇavimāne ugghāṭitamaṇisīhapañjaraṁ viya maññanti, sotaṁ
atk-abh02a3:187_5: rajatapanāḷikaṁ viya pāmaṅgasuttakaṁ viya ca maññanti, tuṅganāsāti laddhavohāraṁ
atk-abh02a3:187_6: ghānaṁ vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitaharitālavaṭṭiṁ viya maññanti, jivhaṁ rattakambalapaṭalaṁ viya
atk-abh02a3:187_7: mudusiniddhamadhurarasadaṁ maññanti, kāyaṁ sālalaṭṭhiṁ viya suvaṇṇatoraṇaṁ viya ca
atk-abh02a3:187_8: maññanti, manaṁ aññesaṁ manena asadisaṁ uḷāraṁ maññanti, rūpaṁ suvaṇṇakaṇikārapupphādivaṇṇaṁ
atk-abh02a3:187_10: catusamuṭṭhānikagandhārammaṇādīni ‘kassa aññassa evarūpāni atthī’ti maññanti. Tesaṁ
atk-abh02a3:187_11: evaṁ maññamānānaṁ tāni cakkhādīni piyarūpāni ceva honti sātarūpāni ca. Atha nesaṁ
atk-abh02a3:187_12: tattha anuppannā ceva taṇhā uppajjati, uppannā ca punappunaṁ pavattivasena nivisati.
atk-abh02a3:187_13: Tasmā bhagavā – “cakkhuṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ. Etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī”tiādimāha.
atk-abh02a3:187_14: Tattha uppajjamānāti yadā uppajjati tadā ettha uppajjatīti attho. Esa nayo sabbatthāpīti.
atk-abh02a3:190: 204.Nirodhasaccaniddese yo tassāyeva taṇhāyāti ettha ‘yo tasseva dukkhassā’ti vattabbe yasmā samudayanirodheneva dukkhaṁ nirujjhati no aññathā, yathāha –
atk-abh02a3:195_0: Tasmā taṁ dukkhanirodhaṁ dassento samudayanirodhena dassetuṁ evamāha. Sīhasamānavuttino
atk-abh02a3:195_1: hi tathāgatā. Te dukkhaṁ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca dassentā hetumhi paṭipajjanti,
atk-abh02a3:195_2: na phale. Suvānavuttino pana aññatitthiyā. Te dukkhaṁ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca
atk-abh02a3:195_3: dassentā attakilamathānuyogena ceva tasseva ca desanāya phale paṭipajjanti, na hetumhīti.
atk-abh02a3:195_4: Sīhasamānavuttitāya satthā hetumhi paṭipajjanto yo tassāyevātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a3:196_0: Tattha tassāyevāti yā sā uppatti nivesavasena heṭṭhā pakāsitā tassāyeva. Asesavirāganirodhotiādīni
atk-abh02a3:196_1: sabbāni nibbānavevacanāneva. Nibbānañhi āgamma taṇhā asesā virajjati nirujjhati.
atk-abh02a3:196_2: Tasmā taṁ “tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho”ti vuccati. Nibbānañca āgamma taṇhā
atk-abh02a3:196_3: cajiyati, paṭinissajjiyati, muccati, na alliyati. Tasmā nibbānaṁ “cāgo paṭinissaggo
atk-abh02a3:196_4: mutti anālayo”ti vuccati. Ekameva hi nibbānaṁ. Nāmāni panassa sabbasaṅkhatānaṁ nāmapaṭipakkhavasena
atk-abh02a3:196_5: anekāni nibbānavevacanāneva honti, seyyathidaṁ – asesavirāganirodho, cāgo, paṭinissaggo,
atk-abh02a3:196_6: mutti, anālayo, rāgakkhayo, dosakkhayo, mohakkhayo, taṇhākkhayo, anuppādo, appavattaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:196_7: animittaṁ, appaṇihitaṁ, anāyūhanaṁ, appaṭisandhi, anupapatti, agati, ajātaṁ, ajaraṁ,
atk-abh02a3:196_8: abyādhi, amataṁ, asokaṁ, aparidevaṁ, anupāyāsaṁ, asaṁkiliṭṭhantiādīni.
atk-abh02a3:197_0: Idāni maggena chinnāya nibbānaṁ āgamma appavattipattāyapi ca taṇhāya yesu vatthūsu
atk-abh02a3:197_1: tassā uppatti dassitā, tattheva abhāvaṁ dassetuṁ sā kho panesātiādimāha. Tattha yathā
atk-abh02a3:197_2: puriso khette jātaṁ tittaalābuvalliṁ disvā aggato paṭṭhāya mūlaṁ pariyesitvā chindeyya,
atk-abh02a3:197_3: sā anupubbena milāyitvā appavattiṁ gaccheyya. Tato tasmiṁ khette tittaalābu niruddhā
atk-abh02a3:197_4: pahīnāti vucceyya. Evameva khette tittaalābu viya cakkhādīsu taṇhā. Sā ariyamaggena
atk-abh02a3:197_5: mūlacchinnā nibbānaṁ āgamma appavattiṁ gacchati. Evaṁ gatā pana tesu vatthūsu khette
atk-abh02a3:197_6: tittaalābu viya na paññāyati. Yathā ca aṭavito core ānetvā nagarassa dakkhiṇadvāre
atk-abh02a3:197_7: ghāteyyuṁ, tato aṭaviyaṁ corā matāti vā māritāti vā vucceyyuṁ; evameva aṭaviyaṁ corā
atk-abh02a3:197_8: viya yā cakkhādīsu taṇhā, sā dakkhiṇadvāre corā viya nibbānaṁ āgamma niruddhattā
atk-abh02a3:197_9: nibbāne niruddhā. Evaṁ niruddhā pana tesu vatthūsu aṭaviyaṁ corā viya na paññāyati.
atk-abh02a3:197_10: Tenassā tattheva nirodhaṁ dassento “cakkhuṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ, etthesā taṇhā
atk-abh02a3:197_11: pahīyamānā pahīyati, ettha nirujjhamānā nirujjhatī”tiādimāha. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh02a3:200_1: kilesehi ārakattā ariyabhāvakarattā ariyaphalapaṭilābhakarattā ca ariyo. Aṭṭhaṅgāni
atk-abh02a3:200_2: assāti aṭṭhaṅgiko. Svāyaṁ caturaṅgikā viya senā, pañcaṅgikaṁ viya tūriyaṁ aṅgamattameva
atk-abh02a3:200_3: hoti, aṅgavinimutto natthi. Nibbānatthikehi maggīyati, nibbānaṁ vā maggati, kilese
atk-abh02a3:200_4: vā mārento gacchatīti maggo. Seyyathidanti so katamoti ceti attho.
atk-abh02a3:201_0: Idāni aṅgamattameva maggo hoti, aṅgavinimmutto natthīti dassento sammādiṭṭhi…pe…
atk-abh02a3:201_1: sammāsamādhīti āha. Tattha sammā dassanalakkhaṇā sammādiṭṭhi. Sammā abhiniropanalakkhaṇo
atk-abh02a3:201_2: sammāsaṅkappo. Sammā pariggahalakkhaṇā sammāvācā. Sammā samuṭṭhāpanalakkhaṇo sammākammanto.
atk-abh02a3:201_3: Sammā vodānalakkhaṇo sammāājīvo. Sammā paggahalakkhaṇo sammāvāyāmo. Sammā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇā
atk-abh02a3:202_0: Tesu ca ekekassa tīṇi tīṇi kiccāni honti, seyyathidaṁ – sammādiṭṭhi tāva aññehipi
atk-abh02a3:202_1: attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhiṁ micchādiṭṭhiṁ pajahati, nirodhaṁ ārammaṇaṁ karoti,
atk-abh02a3:202_2: sampayuttadhamme ca passati tappaṭicchādakamohavidhamanavasena asammohato. Sammāsaṅkappādayopi
atk-abh02a3:202_3: tatheva micchāsaṅkappādīni ca pajahanti, nirodhañca ārammaṇaṁ karonti. Visesato panettha
atk-abh02a3:202_4: sammāsaṅkappo sahajātadhamme abhiniropeti, sammāvācā sammā pariggaṇhāti, sammākammanto
atk-abh02a3:202_5: sammā samuṭṭhāpeti, sammāājīvo sammā vodāpeti, sammāvāyāmo sammā paggaṇhāti, sammāsati
atk-abh02a3:203_0: Apicesā sammādiṭṭhi nāma pubbabhāge nānākkhaṇā nānārammaṇā hoti, maggakāle ekakkhaṇā
atk-abh02a3:203_1: ekārammaṇā, kiccato pana dukkhe ñāṇantiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati. Sammāsaṅkappādayopi
atk-abh02a3:203_2: pubbabhāge nānākkhaṇā nānārammaṇā honti, maggakāle ekakkhaṇā ekārammaṇā. Tesu sammāsaṅkappo
atk-abh02a3:203_3: kiccato nekkhammasaṅkappotiādīni tīṇi nāmāni labhati. Sammāvācādayo tayo pubbabhāge
atk-abh02a3:203_4: nānākkhaṇā nānārammaṇā viratiyopi honti cetanāyopi, maggakkhaṇe pana viratiyova.
atk-abh02a3:203_5: Sammāvāyāmo sammāsatīti idampi dvayaṁ kiccato sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasena cattāri
atk-abh02a3:203_6: nāmāni labhati. Sammāsamādhi pana pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepi sammāsamādhiyeva.
atk-abh02a3:204_0: Iti imesu aṭṭhasu dhammesu bhagavatā nibbānādhigamāya paṭipannassa yogino bahūpakārattā
atk-abh02a3:204_1: paṭhamaṁ sammādiṭṭhi desitā. Ayañhi “paññāpajjoto paññāsattha”nti ca vuttā. Tasmā
atk-abh02a3:204_2: etāya pubbabhāge vipassanāñāṇasaṅkhātāya sammādiṭṭhiyā avijjandhakāraṁ viddhaṁsetvā
atk-abh02a3:204_3: kilesacore ghātento khemena yogāvacaro nibbānaṁ pāpuṇāti. Tena vuttaṁ “nibbānādhigamāya
atk-abh02a3:204_4: paṭipannassa yogino bahūpakārattā paṭhamaṁ sammādiṭṭhi desitā”ti.
atk-abh02a3:205_0: Sammāsaṅkappo pana tassā bahūpakāro, tasmā tadanantaraṁ vutto. Yathā hi heraññiko
atk-abh02a3:205_1: hatthena parivattetvā parivattetvā cakkhunā kahāpaṇaṁ olokento ‘ayaṁ kūṭo, ayaṁ cheko’ti
atk-abh02a3:205_2: jānāti, evaṁ yogāvacaropi pubbabhāge vitakkena vitakketvā vipassanāpaññāya olokayamāno
atk-abh02a3:205_3: ‘ime dhammā kāmāvacarā, ime dhammā rūpāvacarādayo’ti jānāti. Yathā vā pana purisena
atk-abh02a3:205_4: koṭiyaṁ gahetvā parivattetvā parivattetvā dinnaṁ mahārukkhaṁ tacchako vāsiyā tacchetvā
atk-abh02a3:205_5: kamme upaneti, evaṁ vitakkena vitakketvā vitakkatvā dinnadhamme yogāvacaro paññāya
atk-abh02a3:205_6: ‘ime dhammā kāmāvacarā, ime dhammā rūpāvacarā’tiādinā nayena paricchinditvā kamme
atk-abh02a3:205_7: upaneti. Tena vuttaṁ ‘sammāsaṅkappo pana tassā bahūpakāro, tasmā tadanantaraṁ vutto”ti.
atk-abh02a3:206: Svāyaṁ yathā sammādiṭṭhiyā, evaṁ sammāvācāyapi upakārako. Yathāha – “pubbe kho, gahapati, vitakketvā vicāretvā pacchā vācaṁ bhindatī”ti. Tasmā tadanantaraṁ sammāvācā vuttā.
atk-abh02a3:207: Yasmā pana ‘idañcidañca karissāmā’ti paṭhamaṁ vācāya saṁvidahitvā loke kammante payojenti, tasmā vācā kāyakammassa upakārikāti sammāvācāya anantaraṁ sammākammanto vutto.
atk-abh02a3:208_0: Catubbidhaṁ pana vacīduccaritaṁ, tividhaṁ kāyaduccaritaṁ pahāya ubhayaṁ sucaritaṁ
atk-abh02a3:208_1: pūrentasseva yasmā ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṁ pūrati, na itarassa, tasmā tadubhayānantaraṁ sammāājīvo vutto.
atk-abh02a3:209_0: Evaṁ suddhājīvena ‘parisuddho me ājīvo’ti ettāvatā paritosaṁ akatvā suttappamattena
atk-abh02a3:209_1: viharituṁ na yuttaṁ, atha kho sabbairiyāpathesu idaṁ vīriyamārabhitabbanti dassetuṁ
atk-abh02a3:210: Tato āraddhavīriyenāpi kāyādīsu catūsu vatthūsu sati suppatiṭṭhitā kātabbāti dassanatthaṁ tadanantaraṁ sammāsati desitā.
atk-abh02a3:211_0: Yasmā pana evaṁ suppatiṭṭhitā sati samādhissa upakārānupakārānaṁ dhammānaṁ gatiyo
atk-abh02a3:211_1: samanvesitvā pahoti ekattārammaṇe cittaṁ samādhātuṁ, tasmā sammāsatianantaraṁ sammāsamādhi desitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a3:212_0: Sammādiṭṭhiniddese “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādinā catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṁ dassitaṁ. Tattha purimāni
atk-abh02a3:212_1: dve saccāni vaṭṭaṁ, pacchimāni vivaṭṭaṁ. Tesu bhikkhuno vaṭṭe kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso
atk-abh02a3:212_2: hoti, vivaṭṭe natthi abhiniveso. Purimāni hi dve saccāni “pañcakkhandhā dukkhaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:212_3: taṇhā samudayo”ti evaṁ saṅkhepena ca “katame pañcakkhandhā? Rūpakkhandho”tiādinā
atk-abh02a3:212_4: nayena vitthārena ca ācariyassa santike uggaṇhitvā vācāya punappunaṁ parivattento
atk-abh02a3:212_5: yogāvacaro kammaṁ karoti; itaresu pana dvīsu saccesu “nirodhasaccaṁ iṭṭhaṁ kantaṁ
atk-abh02a3:212_6: manāpaṁ, maggasaccaṁ iṭṭhaṁ kantaṁ manāpa”nti evaṁ savaneneva kammaṁ karoti. So evaṁ
atk-abh02a3:212_7: kammaṁ karonto cattāri saccāni ekena paṭivedhena paṭivijjhati, ekābhisamayena abhisameti;
atk-abh02a3:212_8: dukkhaṁ pariññāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati, samudayaṁ pahānapaṭivedhena, nirodhaṁ sacchikiriyapaṭivedhena,
atk-abh02a3:212_9: maggaṁ bhāvanāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati; dukkhaṁ pariññābhisamayena…pe… maggaṁ bhāvanābhisamayena abhisameti.
atk-abh02a3:213_1: hoti, dvīsu savanapaṭivedhoyeva; aparabhāge tīsu kiccato paṭivedho hoti, nirodhe
atk-abh02a3:213_2: ārammaṇapaṭivedho. Tattha sabbampi paṭivedhañāṇaṁ lokuttaraṁ, savanadhāraṇasammasanañāṇaṁ
atk-abh02a3:213_3: lokiyaṁ kāmāvacaraṁ, paccavekkhaṇā pana pattasaccassa hoti. Ayañca ādikammiko. Tasmā
atk-abh02a3:213_4: sā idha na vuttā. Imassa ca bhikkhuno pubbe pariggahato ‘dukkhaṁ parijānāmi, samudayaṁ
atk-abh02a3:213_5: pajahāmi, nirodhaṁ sacchikaromi, maggaṁ bhāvemī’ti ābhogasamannāhāramanasikārapaccavekkhaṇā
atk-abh02a3:213_6: natthi, pariggahato paṭṭhāya hoti; aparabhāge pana dukkhaṁ pariññātameva hoti…pe…
atk-abh02a3:214_0: Tattha dve saccāni duddasattā gambhīrāni, dve gambhīrattā duddasāni. Dukkhasaccañhi
atk-abh02a3:214_1: uppattito pākaṭaṁ; khāṇukaṇṭakappahārādīsu ‘aho dukkha’nti vattabbatampi āpajjati.
atk-abh02a3:214_3: pana ubhayampi gambhīraṁ. Iti tāni duddasattā gambhīrāni. Itaresaṁ pana dvinnaṁ dassanatthāya
atk-abh02a3:214_4: payogo bhavaggagahaṇatthaṁ hatthappasāraṇaṁ viya, avīciphusanatthaṁ pādappasāraṇaṁ
atk-abh02a3:214_5: viya, satadhā bhinnavālassa koṭiyā koṭiṁ paṭipādanaṁ viya ca hoti. Iti tāni gambhīrattā
atk-abh02a3:214_6: duddasāni. Evaṁ duddasattā gambhīresu gambhīrattā ca duddasesu catūsu saccesu uggahādivasena
atk-abh02a3:214_7: pubbabhāgañāṇuppattiṁ sandhāya idaṁ “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṁ. Paṭivedhakkhaṇe pana ekameva ñāṇaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a3:215_0: Sammāsaṅkappaniddese kāmato nissaṭoti nekkhammasaṅkappo. Byāpādato nissaṭoti abyāpādasaṅkappo.
atk-abh02a3:215_1: Vihiṁsāya nissaṭoti avihiṁsāsaṅkappo. Tattha nekkhammavitakko kāmavitakkassa padaghātaṁ
atk-abh02a3:215_2: padacchedaṁ karonto uppajjati, abyāpādavitakko byāpādavitakkassa, avihiṁsāvitakko
atk-abh02a3:215_3: vihiṁsāvitakkassa. Nekkhammavitakko ca kāmavitakkassa paccanīko hutvā uppajjati,
atk-abh02a3:216_0: Tattha yogāvacaro kāmavitakkassa padaghātanatthaṁ kāmavitakkaṁ vā sammasati aññaṁ
atk-abh02a3:216_1: vā pana kiñci saṅkhāraṁ. Athassa vipassanākkhaṇe vipassanāsampayutto saṅkappo tadaṅgavasena
atk-abh02a3:216_2: kāmavitakkassa padaghātaṁ padacchedaṁ karonto uppajjati, vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā
atk-abh02a3:216_3: maggaṁ pāpeti. Athassa maggakkhaṇe maggasampayutto saṅkappo samucchedavasena kāmavitakkassa
atk-abh02a3:216_4: padaghātaṁ padacchedaṁ karonto uppajjati; byāpādavitakkassāpi padaghātanatthaṁ byāpādavitakkaṁ
atk-abh02a3:216_5: vā aññaṁ vā saṅkhāraṁ sammasati; vihiṁsāvitakkassa padaghātanatthaṁ vihiṁsāvitakkaṁ
atk-abh02a3:216_6: vā aññaṁ vā saṅkhāraṁ sammasati. Athassa vipassanākkhaṇeti sabbaṁ purimanayeneva yojetabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:217_0: Kāmavitakkādīnaṁ pana tiṇṇaṁ pāḷiyaṁ vibhattesu aṭṭhatiṁsārammaṇesu ekakammaṭṭhānampi
atk-abh02a3:217_1: apaccanīkaṁ nāma natthi. Ekantato pana kāmavitakkassa tāva asubhesu paṭhamajjhānameva
atk-abh02a3:217_2: paccanīkaṁ, byāpādavitakkassa mettāya tikacatukkajjhānāni, vihiṁsāvitakkassa karuṇāya
atk-abh02a3:217_3: tikacatukkajjhānāni. Tasmā asubhe parikammaṁ katvā jhānaṁ samāpannassa samāpattikkhaṇe
atk-abh02a3:217_4: jhānasampayutto saṅkappo vikkhambhanavasena kāmavitakkassa paccanīko hutvā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a3:217_5: Jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapentassa vipassanākkhaṇe vipassanāsampayutto
atk-abh02a3:217_6: saṅkappo tadaṅgavasena kāmavitakkassa paccanīko hutvā uppajjati. Vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā
atk-abh02a3:217_7: maggaṁ pāpentassa maggakkhaṇe maggasampayutto saṅkappo samucchedavasena kāmavitakkassa
atk-abh02a3:217_8: paccanīko hutvā uppajjati. Evaṁ uppanno nekkhammasaṅkappoti vuccatīti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a3:218_0: Mettāya pana parikammaṁ katvā, karuṇāya parikammaṁ katvā jhānaṁ samāpajjatīti sabbaṁ
atk-abh02a3:218_1: purimanayeneva yojetabbaṁ. Evaṁ uppanno abyāpādasaṅkappoti vuccati, avihiṁsāsaṅkappoti
atk-abh02a3:218_2: ca vuccatīti veditabbo. Evamete nekkhammasaṅkappādayo vipassanājhānavasena uppattīnaṁ
atk-abh02a3:218_3: nānattā pubbabhāge nānā; maggakkhaṇe pana imesu tīsu ṭhānesu uppannassa akusalasaṅkappassa
atk-abh02a3:218_4: padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena maggaṅgaṁ pūrayamāno ekova kusalasaṅkappo uppajjati.
atk-abh02a3:219_0: Sammāvācāniddesepi yasmā aññeneva cittena musāvādā viramati, aññenaññena pisuṇavācādīhi,
atk-abh02a3:219_1: tasmā catassopetā veramaṇiyo pubbabhāge nānā; maggakkhaṇe pana micchāvācāsaṅkhātāya
atk-abh02a3:219_3: pūrayamānā ekāva sammāvācāsaṅkhātā kusalaveramaṇī uppajjati. Ayaṁ sammāvācā nāma.
atk-abh02a3:220_0: Sammākammantaniddesepi yasmā aññeneva cittena pāṇātipātā viramati, aññena adinnādānā,
atk-abh02a3:220_1: aññena kāmesumicchācārā, tasmā tissopetā veramaṇiyo pubbabhāge nānā; maggakkhaṇe
atk-abh02a3:220_2: pana micchākammantasaṅkhātāya tividhāya akusaladussīlyacetanāya padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-abh02a3:220_3: maggaṅgaṁ pūrayamānā ekāva sammākammantasaṅkhātā akusalaveramaṇī uppajjati. Ayaṁ sammākammanto nāma.
atk-abh02a3:221_0: Sammāājīvaniddese idhāti imasmiṁ sāsane. Ariyasāvakoti ariyassa buddhassa sāvako.
atk-abh02a3:221_1: Micchāājīvaṁ pahāyāti pāpakaṁ ājīvaṁ pajahitvā. Sammāājīvenāti buddhapasatthena kusalaājīvena.
atk-abh02a3:221_2: Jīvikaṁ kappetīti jīvitappavattiṁ pavatteti. Idhāpi yasmā aññeneva cittena kāyadvāravītikkamā
atk-abh02a3:221_3: viramati; aññena vacīdvāravītikkamā, tasmā pubbabhāge nānākkhaṇesu uppajjati; maggakkhaṇe
atk-abh02a3:221_4: pana dvīsu dvāresu sattannaṁ kammapathānaṁ vasena uppannāya micchāājīvadussīlyacetanāya
atk-abh02a3:221_5: padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena maggaṅgaṁ pūrayamānā ekāva sammāājīvasaṅkhātā
atk-abh02a3:222_1: pana pubbabhāge nānācittesu labhati. Aññeneva hi cittena anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ
atk-abh02a3:222_2: dhammānaṁ anuppādāya vāyāmaṁ karoti, aññena uppannānaṁ pahānāya; aññeneva ca anuppannānaṁ
atk-abh02a3:222_3: kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya, aññena uppannānaṁ ṭhitiyā; maggakkhaṇe pana ekacitteyeva
atk-abh02a3:222_4: labbhati. Ekameva hi maggasampayuttaṁ vīriyaṁ catukiccasādhanaṭṭhena cattāri nāmāni labbhati.
atk-abh02a3:223_1: ca pubbabhāge nānācittesu labbhati. Aññeneva hi cittena kāyaṁ pariggaṇhāti, aññenaññena
atk-abh02a3:223_2: vedanādīni; maggakkhaṇe pana ekacitteyeva labbhati. Ekāyeva hi maggasampayuttā sati
atk-abh02a3:224_0: Sammāsamādhiniddese cattāri jhānāni pubbabhāgepi nānā, maggakkhaṇepi. Pubbabhāge
atk-abh02a3:224_1: samāpattivasena nānā, maggakkhaṇe nānāmaggavasena. Ekassa hi paṭhamamaggo paṭhamajjhāniko
atk-abh02a3:224_2: hoti, dutiyamaggādayopi paṭhamajjhānikā, dutiyādīsu aññatarajjhānikā vā. Ekassa paṭhamamaggo
atk-abh02a3:224_3: dutiyādīnaṁ aññatarajjhāniko hoti, dutiyādayopi dutiyādīnaṁ aññatarajjhānikā vā paṭhamajjhānikā
atk-abh02a3:224_4: vā. Evaṁ cattāropi maggā jhānavasena sadisā vā asadisā vā ekaccasadisā vā honti.
atk-abh02a3:225_0: Ayaṁ panassa viseso pādakajjhānaniyāmena hoti. Pādakajjhānaniyāmena tāva paṭhamajjhānalābhino
atk-abh02a3:225_1: paṭhamajjhānā vuṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppannamaggo paṭhamajjhāniko hoti; maggaṅgabojjhaṅgāni
atk-abh02a3:225_2: panettha paripuṇṇāneva honti. Dutiyajjhānato uṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppanno maggo
atk-abh02a3:225_3: dutiyajjhāniko hoti; maggaṅgāni panettha satta honti. Tatiyajjhānato uṭṭhāya vipassantassa
atk-abh02a3:225_4: uppanno maggo tatiyajjhāniko hoti; maggaṅgāni panettha satta, bojjhaṅgāni cha honti.
atk-abh02a3:225_5: Esa nayo catutthajjhānato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā.
atk-abh02a3:226_0: Āruppe catukkapañcakajjhānaṁ uppajjati. Tañca kho lokuttaraṁ no lokiyanti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:226_1: Ettha kathanti? Etthāpi paṭhamajjhānādīsu yato uṭṭhāya sotāpattimaggaṁ paṭilabhitvā
atk-abh02a3:226_2: āruppasamāpattiṁ bhāvetvā yo āruppe uppanno, taṁjhānikāva tassa tattha tayo maggā
atk-abh02a3:226_3: uppajjanti. Evaṁ pādakajjhānameva niyāmeti. Keci pana therā “vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā
atk-abh02a3:226_4: khandhā niyāmentī”ti vadanti. Keci “puggalajjhāsayo niyāmetī”ti vadanti. Keci “vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā
atk-abh02a3:226_5: niyāmetī”ti vadanti. Tesaṁ vādavinicchayo heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe lokuttarapadabhājanīyavaṇṇanāyaṁ
atk-abh02a3:226_6: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Ayaṁ vuccati sammāsamādhīti yā imesu catūsu jhānesu ekaggatā,
atk-abh02a3:226_7: ayaṁ pubbabhāge lokiyo, aparabhāge lokuttaro sammāsamādhi nāma vuccatīti. Evaṁ lokiyalokuttaravasena
atk-abh02a3:227_0: Tattha lokiyamagge sabbāneva maggaṅgāni yathānurūpaṁ chasu ārammaṇesu aññatarārammaṇāni
atk-abh02a3:227_1: honti. Lokuttaramagge pana catusaccapaṭivedhāya pavattassa ariyassa nibbānārammaṇaṁ
atk-abh02a3:227_2: avijjānusayasamugghātakaṁ paññācakkhu sammādiṭṭhi. Tathā sampannadiṭṭhissa taṁsampayuttaṁ
atk-abh02a3:227_4: Tathā passantassa vitakkentassa ca taṁsampayuttāva catubbidhavacīduccaritasamugghātikāya
atk-abh02a3:227_5: micchāvācāya virati sammāvācā. Tathā viramantassa taṁsampayuttāva micchākammantasamucchedikā
atk-abh02a3:227_7: taṁsampayuttāva kuhanādisamucchedikā micchāājīvavirati sammāājīvo. Imissā sammāvācākammantājīvasaṁkhātāya
atk-abh02a3:227_8: sīlabhūmiyaṁ patiṭṭhamānassa tadanurūpo taṁsampayuttova kosajjasamucchedako anuppannuppannānaṁ
atk-abh02a3:227_9: akusalakusalānaṁ anuppādapahānuppādaṭṭhitisādhako ca vīriyārambho sammāvāyāmo. Evaṁ
atk-abh02a3:227_11: ca cetaso asammoso sammāsati. Iti anuttarāya satiyā suvihitacittārakkhassa taṁsampayuttāva
atk-abh02a3:227_12: micchāsamādhisamugghātikā cittekaggatā sammāsamādhīti. Esa lokuttaro ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
atk-abh02a3:227_13: maggo yo saha lokiyena maggena dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti saṅkhaṁ gato.
atk-abh02a3:228_0: So kho panesa maggo sammādiṭṭhisaṅkappānaṁ vijjāya, sesadhammānaṁ caraṇena saṅgahitattā
atk-abh02a3:228_1: vijjā ceva caraṇañca. Tathā tesaṁ dvinnaṁ vipassanāyānena, itaresaṁ samathayānena
atk-abh02a3:228_2: saṅgahitattā samatho ceva vipassanā ca. Tesaṁ vā dvinnaṁ paññākkhandhena, tadanantarānaṁ
atk-abh02a3:228_4: ca saṅgahitattā khandhattayañceva sikkhāttayañca hoti; yena samannāgato ariyasāvako
atk-abh02a3:228_5: dassanasamatthehi cakkhūhi gamanasamatthehi ca pādehi samannāgato addhiko viya vijjācaraṇasampanno
atk-abh02a3:228_7: antadvayaṁ parivajjetvā majjhimapaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno paññākkhandhena mohakkhandhaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:228_8: sīlakkhandhena dosakkhandhaṁ, samādhikkhandhena ca lobhakkhandhaṁ padālento adhipaññāsikkhāya
atk-abh02a3:228_10: tisso sampattiyo patvā amataṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti, ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇaṁ
atk-abh02a3:231_0: 206-214. Idāni abhidhammabhājanīyaṁ hoti. Tattha “ariyasaccānī”ti avatvā nippadesato
atk-abh02a3:231_1: paccayasaṅkhātaṁ samudayaṁ dassetuṁ “cattāri saccānī”ti vuttaṁ. Ariyasaccānīti hi
atk-abh02a3:231_2: vutte avasesā ca kilesā, avasesā ca akusalā dhammā, tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavāni,
atk-abh02a3:231_3: avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā na saṅgayhanti. Na ca kevalaṁ taṇhāva dukkhaṁ samudāneti,
atk-abh02a3:231_4: imepi avasesā ca kilesādayo paccayā samudānentiyeva. Iti imepi paccayā dukkhaṁ samudānentiyevāti
atk-abh02a3:231_5: nippadesato paccayasaṅkhātaṁ samudayaṁ dassetuṁ “ariyasaccānī”ti avatvā “cattāri saccānī”ti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:232_0: Niddesavāre ca nesaṁ paṭhamaṁ dukkhaṁ aniddisitvā tasseva dukkhassa sukhaniddesatthaṁ
atk-abh02a3:232_1: dukkhasamudayo niddiṭṭho. Tasmiñhi niddiṭṭhe “avasesā ca kilesā”tiādinā nayena dukkhasaccaṁ
atk-abh02a3:232_2: sukhaniddesaṁ hoti. Nirodhasaccampettha taṇhāya pahānaṁ “taṇhāya ca avasesānañca
atk-abh02a3:232_3: kilesānaṁ pahāna”nti evaṁ yathāvuttassa samudayassa pahānavasena pañcahākārehi niddiṭṭhaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:232_5: desanānayassa mukhamattameva dassentena niddiṭṭhaṁ. Tattha nayabhedo veditabbo. Taṁ
atk-abh02a3:233_0: Yasmā pana na kevalaṁ aṭṭhaṅgiko maggova paṭipadā “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṁ
atk-abh02a3:233_1: vacīkammaṁ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti vacanato pana puggalajjhāsayavasena pañcaṅgikopi
atk-abh02a3:233_2: maggo paṭipadā evāti desito, tasmā taṁ nayaṁ dassetuṁ pañcaṅgikavāropi niddiṭṭho.
atk-abh02a3:233_3: Yasmā ca na kevalaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikapañcaṅgikamaggāva paṭipadā, sampayuttakā pana atirekapaññāsadhammāpi
atk-abh02a3:233_4: paṭipadā eva, tasmā taṁ nayaṁ dassetuṁ tatiyo sabbasaṅgāhikavāropi niddiṭṭho. Tattha
atk-abh02a3:233_5: “avasesā dhammā dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya sampayuttā”ti idaṁ parihāyati. Sesaṁ
atk-abh02a3:234_0: Tattha aṭṭhaṅgikavārassa “taṇhāya avasesānañca kilesānaṁ pahāna”ntiādīsu pañcasu
atk-abh02a3:234_1: koṭṭhāsesu paṭhamakoṭṭhāse tāva sotāpattimagge jhānābhinivese suddhikapaṭipadā, suddhikasuññatā,
atk-abh02a3:234_2: suññatapaṭipadā, suddhikaappaṇihitaṁ, appaṇihitapaṭipadāti imesu pañcasu vāresu dvinnaṁ
atk-abh02a3:234_3: dvinnaṁ catukkapañcakanayānaṁ vasena dasa nayā honti. Evaṁ sesesupīti vīsatiyā abhinivesesu
atk-abh02a3:234_4: dve nayasatāni. Tāni catūhi adhipatīhi catugguṇitāni aṭṭha. Iti suddhikāni dve sādhipatī
atk-abh02a3:234_5: aṭṭhāti sabbampi nayasahassaṁ hoti. Yathā ca sotāpattimagge, evaṁ sesamaggesupīti
atk-abh02a3:234_6: cattāri nayasahassāni honti. Yathā ca paṭhamakoṭṭhāse cattāri, evaṁ sesesupīti aṭṭhaṅgikavāre
atk-abh02a3:234_7: pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu vīsati nayasahassāni honti. Tathā pañcaṅgikavāre sabbasaṅgāhikavāre
atk-abh02a3:234_8: cāti sabbānipi saṭṭhinayasahassāni satthārā vibhattāni. Pāḷi pana saṅkhepena āgatā.
atk-abh02a3:237_0: 215. Pañhāpucchake catunnampi saccānaṁ khandhavibhaṅge vuttanayānusāreneva kusalādibhāvo
atk-abh02a3:237_1: veditabbo. Ārammaṇattikesu pana samudayasaccaṁ kāmāvacaradhamme assādentassa parittārammaṇaṁ
atk-abh02a3:237_2: hoti, mahaggatadhamme assādentassa mahaggatārammaṇaṁ, paññattiṁ assādentassa navattabbārammaṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:237_3: Dukkhasaccaṁ kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha uppannaṁ parittārammaṇaṁ, rūpārūpāvacaradhamme
atk-abh02a3:237_4: ārabbha uppattikāle mahaggatārammaṇaṁ, nava lokuttaradhamme paccavekkhaṇakāle appamāṇārammaṇaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:237_5: paṇṇattiṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle navattabbārammaṇaṁ. Maggasaccaṁ sahajātahetuvasena sabbadāpi
atk-abh02a3:237_6: maggahetukaṁ vīriyaṁ vā vīmaṁsaṁ vā jeṭṭhakaṁ katvā maggabhāvanākāle maggādhipati,
atk-abh02a3:237_7: chandacittesu aññatarādhipatikāle navattabbaṁ nāma hoti. Dukkhasaccaṁ ariyānaṁ maggapaccavekkhaṇakāle
atk-abh02a3:237_8: maggārammaṇaṁ, tesaṁyeva maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhaṇakāle maggādhipati, sesadhammapaccavekkhaṇakāle navattabbaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a3:238_0: Dve saccānīti dukkhasamudayasaccāni. Etāni hi atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha uppattikāle
atk-abh02a3:238_1: atītādiārammaṇāni honti. Samudayasaccaṁ ajjhattādibhede dhamme assādentassa ajjhattādiārammaṇaṁ
atk-abh02a3:238_2: hoti, dukkhasaccaṁ ākiñcaññāyatanakāle navattabbārammaṇampīti veditabbaṁ. Iti imasmiṁ
atk-abh02a3:238_3: pañhāpucchake dve saccāni lokiyāni honti, dve lokuttarāni. Yathā ca imasmiṁ, evaṁ
atk-abh02a3:238_4: purimesupi dvīsu. Sammāsambuddhena hi tīsupi suttantabhājanīyādīsu lokiyalokuttarāneva
atk-abh02a3:238_5: saccāni kathitāni. Evamayaṁ saccavibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṁ nīharitvāva bhājetvā dassitoti.
